section.title: The introductory part
section.p: This is the homepage of Con Exp. This page answers your questions on the tool itself, how to use it, how to get in contact with us and many things more.
The web site is subdivided into three part. The General folder gets you in contact with the FCA community and provides all informations you need to download and install the software.
To answer your questions on how to use Con Exp, we refer to the User folder. It provides a complete documentation and soon it will contain tutorials.
The folder Developers gives you an impression on persons involved in the project, an overview in which direction we want to develop the tool and an opportunity to help or even join us.
